description:
I am getting all ther pollster meters but not notification meters.

below are the contents of my nova.conf

instance_usage_audit_period = hour
instance_usage_audit = True
notification_driver = nova.openstack.common.notifier.rpc_notifier
notification_driver = ceilometer.compute.nova_notifier
notification_topics=notifications
notify_on_state_change=vm_and_task_state






Thanks,
blackcat
title: notification for nova  unavailable

comments.content:
I am getting all ther pollster meters but not notification meters.

below are the contents of my nova.conf

instance_usage_audit_period = hour
instance_usage_audit = True

comments.content: This sounds like a report request, not a bug. Marking it as such.
